meanings.definition: The positively charged electrode in an electrical device.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to connect the anode correctly in the circuit.

meanings.definition: The terminal of a primary cell or battery that is positive when the cell is discharging.
meanings.sent1: Remember to check the anode's charge before using the battery.

meanings.sent3: The anode of the battery always looks on the bright side.
